text: Petru Pascari (; born 22 September 1929 in Stroenți) was a Moldavian SSR politician. Pascari was the prime minister of Moldavian SSR: 24 April 1970 – 1 August 1976 (1st time) and 10 January – 26 May 1990 (2nd time).Паскарь Петр Андреевич ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers Category:Moldovan politicians Category:Soviet politicians
title: Petru Pascari
